verbs.description: It [V: has] become clear since the start of the 2016 campaign that Donald Trump , while claiming to be some kind of business genius , has not the slightest clue how trade deficits and budget deficits work , or even that there is a difference between the two . This his claim that it would be “ easy ” to pay …
